video.title: A Meditation and Teaching on Suffering - Atmananda Krishna Menon  - Advaita
video.description:
Selected excerpts from the text "Atmananda Tattwa Samhita: The Direct Approach To Truth As Expounded By Sri Atmananda" on the nature and experience of suffering.
A shorter version (by the person who formatted these quotes) without music can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CRzghgn58QQ&t=4s&ab_channel=ExistDaily

Śrĩ Atmananda (8 December 1883 – 14 May 1959), also referred as Sri Atmananda Krishna Menon, was an Indian sage, guru, and philosopher. He has been described by scholars as a "neo-Hindu". His teachings have become a foundation for a spiritual method called the Direct Path.
